title: Dirt Rod
summaries: The Dirt Rod is a unique tool that is used solely to move Dirt Blocks around, and is unlike the use of ordinary mining tools and block placement. When used while the cursor is over a Dirt Block, the block becomes a Dirt Ball projectile that sticks to the cursor as long as the âš’ Use / Attack key is held down. The Dirt Ball can be carried through blocks and relocated anywhere on the screen. When released, the Dirt Ball is affected by gravity and also continues to carry the speed it was being moved at previously, allowing it to be "thrown". Upon impact with any blocks, a released Dirt Ball turns back into a solid Dirt Block.
The Dirt Rod is purchased from the Dryad for (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 5 GC / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 20 GC.

statistics.Buy: 5 GC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 20 GC (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Sell: 1 GC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 4 GC (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
